sentences.en: As a result of their compatibility, Haig and Fraser were able to bring about wide-ranging reforms.
sentences.cn: 由于意趣相投，黑格和弗雷泽能带来广泛的改革。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, wide-ranging contraception programs do not usually reduce this rate.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，广泛的避孕方案通常不会降低这一比率。

sentences.en: The New Zealand Government has developed a New Zealand Disability Strategy and has embarked on a wide-ranging consultation process.
sentences.cn: 新西兰政府制定了新西兰残障人士战略，并开始了广泛的协商进程。
